mapper.insert: insert into tab_score(seq_user_no, level, score) values(#{seq_user_no},#{level},#{score})
mapper.select: select u.user_name, u.user_id, level, score_date, min(score) as score from tab_score s join tab_user u on s.seq_user_no = u.seq_user_no where s.level = #{level} group by u.user_name limit 10
